```{r}

input <- list(year = "2023", month = "08")

dw <- config::get("development_stream2")

connection <- DBI::dbConnect(RMariaDB::MariaDB(),
               username = dw$DB_user,
               password = dw$DB_password,
               host     = dw$DB_host,
               port     = dw$DB_port,
               dbname   = dw$DB_name
            )

```
